reviewText: I love the way Ryohei Suzuki looks in this movie he is so sexy. I thought this was a good mix of action, comedy, & just all around silliness. I haven't read all the mangas on this, but I liked the movie alot. The only problem I have is that there are no english subtitles on the one I recieved. So I'm waiting to try & get a different one with subtitles.
